targets.rawSql:
SELECT
  (geo_location).lat AS latitude,
  (geo_location).lon AS longitude,
  COUNT(*) AS count
FROM
  connection_events
WHERE
  (geo_location).lat IS NOT NULL AND
  (geo_location).lon IS NOT NULL
GROUP BY
  (geo_location).lat, (geo_location).lon
ORDER BY
  count DESC;

SELECT app_id, daily_bucket as time, daily_app_connection_count as connections, 'daily' AS metric
FROM daily_connection_stats_per_app
WHERE app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp > '14 days'::interval AND $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
UNION ALL
-- Use hourly aggregate for intervals between 3 and 14 days
SELECT app_id, hourly_bucket as time, hourly_app_connection_count as connections, 'hourly' AS metric
FROM hourly_connection_stats_per_app
WHERE app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'  
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp BETWEEN '3 days'::interval AND '14 days'::interval AND $__timeFilter(hourly_bucket)
UNION ALL
-- Use raw data (minute intervals) intervals between 0 and 3 days
SELECT app_id, quarter_bucket as time, quarter_app_connection_count as connections, '15min' AS metric
FROM quarter_connection_stats_per_app
WHERE app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'  
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval AND  $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT app_id, daily_bucket as time, daily_clients_connection_count as connections, 'daily' AS metric
FROM daily_connection_stats_per_app
WHERE app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp > '14 days'::interval AND $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
UNION ALL
-- Use hourly aggregate for intervals between 3 and 14 days
SELECT app_id, hourly_bucket as time, hourly_clients_connection_count as connections, 'hourly' AS metric
FROM hourly_connection_stats_per_app
WHERE app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'  
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp BETWEEN '3 days'::interval AND '14 days'::interval AND $__timeFilter(hourly_bucket)
UNION ALL
-- Use raw data (minute intervals) intervals between 0 and 3 days
SELECT app_id, quarter_bucket as time, quarter_clients_connection_count as connections, '15min' AS metric
FROM quarter_connection_stats_per_app
WHERE app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'  
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval AND  $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT ra.app_name, ds.daily_bucket as time, ds.daily_active_users as active_users, 'daily' AS metric
FROM daily_sessions_stats_per_app ds
JOIN registered_apps ra ON ds.app_id = ra.app_id
WHERE ds.app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
AND $__timeFilter(ds.daily_bucket)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT ra.app_name, ds.daily_bucket as time, ds.daily_sessions_opened as sessions_opened, 'daily' AS metric
FROM daily_sessions_stats_per_app ds
JOIN registered_apps ra ON ds.app_id = ra.app_id
WHERE ds.app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp > '14 days'::interval AND $__timeFilter(ds.daily_bucket)

UNION ALL

-- Hourly aggregate for intervals between 3 and 14 days
SELECT ra.app_name, hs.hourly_bucket as time, hs.hourly_sessions_opened as sessions_opened, 'hourly' AS metric
FROM hourly_sessions_stats_per_app hs
JOIN registered_apps ra ON hs.app_id = ra.app_id
WHERE hs.app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp BETWEEN '3 days'::interval AND '14 days'::interval AND $__timeFilter(hs.hourly_bucket)

UNION ALL

-- Use raw data (minute intervals) for intervals between 0 and 3 days
SELECT ra.app_id, qs.quarter_bucket as time, qs.quarter_app_connection_count as connections, '15min' AS metric
FROM quarter_connection_stats_per_app qs
JOIN registered_apps ra ON qs.app_id = ra.app_id
WHERE qs.app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'  
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval AND  $__timeFilter(qs.quarter_bucket)
ORDER BY time;

UNION ALL

UNION ALL
-- Use 15 minutes interval 0 and 3 days

FROM quarter_events_change_network_stats_per_app
WHERE app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'  
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval AND  $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
ORDER BY time;

SELECT 
    app_id, 
    wallet_name,
    time, 
    SUM(success_requests) AS success_requests, 
    SUM(failed_requests) AS failed_requests, 
    metric
FROM (
    SELECT 
        app_id, 
        wallet_name, 
        daily_bucket AS time, 
        daily_successful_requests AS success_requests, 
        daily_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests, 
        'daily' AS metric
    FROM 
        daily_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE 
        app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}' AND 
        $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp > '14 days'::interval AND 
        $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
    
    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        app_id, 
        wallet_name, 
        hour_bucket AS time, 
        hour_successful_requests AS success_requests, 
        hour_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests, 
        'hourly' AS metric
    FROM 
        hour_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE 
        app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}' AND 
        $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp BETWEEN '3 days'::interval AND '14 days'::interval AND 
        $__timeFilter(hour_bucket)
    
    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        app_id, 
        wallet_name, 
        quarter_bucket AS time, 
        quarter_successful_requests AS success_requests, 
        quarter_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests, 
        '15min' AS metric
    FROM 
        quarter_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE 
        app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}' AND 
        $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval AND 
        $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
) aggregated
GROUP BY 
    app_id, 
    wallet_name,
    time, 
    metric
ORDER BY 
    time;

SELECT
  'sign_message' as request_type,
  app_id,
  daily_bucket as time,
  daily_successful_requests as success_requests,
  daily_unsuccessful_requests as failed_requests,

WHERE

UNION

  AND $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
UNION
ALL ---------------------------------------------------------------------
SELECT
  'change_wallet' as request_type,
  app_id,
  time,
  SUM(success_requests) AS success_requests,
  SUM(failed_requests) AS failed_requests,
  metric
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      app_id,
      wallet_name,
      daily_bucket AS time,
      daily_successful_requests AS success_requests,
      daily_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
      'daily' AS metric
    FROM
      daily_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE
      app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
      AND $__timeTo() :: timestamp - $__timeFrom() :: timestamp > '14 days' :: interval
      AND $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
    UNION
    ALL
    SELECT
      app_id,
      wallet_name,
      hour_bucket AS time,
      hour_successful_requests AS success_requests,
      hour_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
      'hourly' AS metric
    FROM
      hour_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE
      app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
      AND $__timeTo() :: timestamp - $__timeFrom() :: timestamp BETWEEN '3 days' :: interval
      AND '14 days' :: interval
      AND $__timeFilter(hour_bucket)
    UNION
    ALL
    SELECT
      app_id,
      wallet_name,
      quarter_bucket AS time,
      quarter_successful_requests AS success_requests,
      quarter_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
      '15min' AS metric
    FROM
      quarter_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE
      app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
      AND $__timeTo() :: timestamp - $__timeFrom() :: timestamp < '3 days' :: interval
      AND $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
  ) aggregated
GROUP BY
  app_id,
  wallet_name,
  time,
  metric
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT
  'change_wallet' as request_type,
  app_id,
  time,
  SUM(success_requests) AS success_requests,
  SUM(failed_requests) AS failed_requests,
  metric
FROM
  (
    SELECT
      app_id,
      wallet_name,
      daily_bucket AS time,
      daily_successful_requests AS success_requests,
      daily_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
      'daily' AS metric
    FROM
      daily_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE
      app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
      AND $__timeTo() :: timestamp - $__timeFrom() :: timestamp > '14 days' :: interval
      AND $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
    UNION
    ALL
    SELECT
      app_id,
      wallet_name,
      hour_bucket AS time,
      hour_successful_requests AS success_requests,
      hour_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
      'hourly' AS metric
    FROM
      hour_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE
      app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
      AND $__timeTo() :: timestamp - $__timeFrom() :: timestamp BETWEEN '3 days' :: interval
      AND '14 days' :: interval
      AND $__timeFilter(hour_bucket)
    UNION
    ALL
    SELECT
      app_id,
      wallet_name,
      quarter_bucket AS time,
      quarter_successful_requests AS success_requests,
      quarter_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
      '15min' AS metric
    FROM
      quarter_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE
      app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
      AND $__timeTo() :: timestamp - $__timeFrom() :: timestamp < '3 days' :: interval
      AND $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
  ) aggregated
GROUP BY
  app_id,
  wallet_name,
  time,
  metric
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT
  time,
  SUM(success_requests) AS success_requests,
  SUM(failed_requests) AS failed_requests,
  metric
FROM (
  SELECT
    'sign_message' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    daily_bucket AS time,
    daily_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    daily_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    'daily' AS metric
  FROM
    daily_events_sign_message_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp > '14 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'sign_message' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    hour_bucket AS time,
    hour_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    hour_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    'hourly' AS metric
  FROM
    hour_events_sign_message_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp BETWEEN '3 days'::interval AND '14 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(hour_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'sign_message' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    quarter_bucket AS time,
    quarter_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    quarter_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    '15min' AS metric
  FROM
    quarter_events_sign_message_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'sign_transaction' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    daily_bucket AS time,
    daily_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    daily_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    'daily' AS metric
  FROM
    daily_events_sign_transaction_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp > '14 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'sign_transaction' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    hour_bucket AS time,
    hour_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    hour_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    'hourly' AS metric
  FROM
    hour_events_sign_transaction_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp BETWEEN '3 days'::interval AND '14 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(hour_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'sign_transaction' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    quarter_bucket AS time,
    quarter_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    quarter_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    '15min' AS metric
  FROM
    quarter_events_sign_transaction_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'sign_and_send_transaction' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    daily_bucket AS time,
    daily_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    daily_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    'daily' AS metric
  FROM
    daily_events_sign_and_send_transaction_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp > '14 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'sign_and_send_transaction' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    hour_bucket AS time,
    hour_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    hour_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    'hourly' AS metric
  FROM
    hour_events_sign_and_send_transaction_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp BETWEEN '3 days'::interval AND '14 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(hour_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'sign_and_send_transaction' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    quarter_bucket AS time,
    quarter_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    quarter_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    '15min' AS metric
  FROM
    quarter_events_sign_and_send_transaction_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'change_network' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    daily_bucket AS time,
    daily_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    daily_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    'daily' AS metric
  FROM
    daily_events_change_network_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp > '14 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'change_network' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    hour_bucket AS time,
    hour_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    hour_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    'hourly' AS metric
  FROM
    hour_events_change_network_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp BETWEEN '3 days'::interval AND '14 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(hour_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'change_network' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    quarter_bucket AS time,
    quarter_successful_requests AS success_requests,
    quarter_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
    '15min' AS metric
  FROM
    quarter_events_change_network_stats_per_app
  WHERE
    app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
    AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval
    AND $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    'change_wallet' AS request_type,
    app_id,
    time,
    SUM(success_requests) AS success_requests,
    SUM(failed_requests) AS failed_requests,
    metric
  FROM (
    SELECT
      app_id,
      wallet_name,
      daily_bucket AS time,
      daily_successful_requests AS success_requests,
      daily_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
      'daily' AS metric
    FROM
      daily_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE
      app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
      AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp > '14 days'::interval
      AND $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
      app_id,
      wallet_name,
      hour_bucket AS time,
      hour_successful_requests AS success_requests,
      hour_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
      'hourly' AS metric
    FROM
      hour_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE
      app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
      AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp BETWEEN '3 days'::interval AND '14 days'::interval
      AND $__timeFilter(hour_bucket)
    UNION ALL
    SELECT
      app_id,
      wallet_name,
      quarter_bucket AS time,
      quarter_successful_requests AS success_requests,
      quarter_unsuccessful_requests AS failed_requests,
      '15min' AS metric
    FROM
      quarter_events_change_wallet_stats_per_app
    WHERE
      app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
      AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval
      AND $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
  ) aggregated
  GROUP BY
    app_id,
    wallet_name,
    time,
    metric
) combined
GROUP BY
  time,
  metric
ORDER BY
  time;

SELECT daily_bucket as time, daily_mobile_sessions as mobile_sessions, daily_web_sessions as web_sessions, daily_unknown_sessions as unknown_sessions, 'daily' AS metric
FROM daily_events_app_connect_session_type_stats_per_app
WHERE app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp > '14 days'::interval AND $__timeFilter(daily_bucket)
UNION ALL

SELECT hour_bucket as time, hour_mobile_sessions as mobile_sessions, hour_web_sessions as web_sessions, hour_unknown_sessions as unknown_sessions,  'hourly' AS metric
FROM hour_events_app_connect_session_type_stats_per_app
WHERE app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'  
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp BETWEEN '3 days'::interval AND '14 days'::interval AND $__timeFilter(hour_bucket)
UNION ALL

SELECT quarter_bucket as time, quarter_mobile_sessions as mobile_sessions, quarter_web_sessions as web_sessions, quarter_unknown_sessions as unknown_sessions,  '15min' AS metric
FROM quarter_events_app_connect_session_type_stats_per_app
WHERE app_id = '${__dashboard.uid}'  
AND $__timeTo()::timestamp - $__timeFrom()::timestamp < '3 days'::interval AND  $__timeFilter(quarter_bucket)
ORDER BY time;
